summary: The implementation successfully applies the custom background image (IMG_20260219_080023.png.jpg) across all pages, maintains dark theme styling with semi-transparent overlays, and updates text colors to white/near-white tones for enhanced visibility. All three requirements (REQ-1, REQ-2, REQ-3) are fully implemented with proper evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Added custom CSS utility classes (.card-overlay, .container-overlay, .glass-overlay) for semi-transparent dark overlays
hallucinated_features.reason: These utility classes were not explicitly requested in the BuildRequest but were added to support the dark theme implementation

hallucinated_features.description: Added custom color tokens (--text-primary, --text-secondary, --text-muted) and Tailwind color extensions
hallucinated_features.reason: While the requirement specified white/near-white text colors, the specific implementation of CSS variables and Tailwind color tokens was not explicitly requested

hallucinated_features.description: Applied backdrop-filter blur effects to UI components
hallucinated_features.reason: Blur effects were not mentioned in the requirements, though they support the readability constraint
